00382                 DataBuf* tryGetFreeBuffer(void)
00383                 {
00384                         DataBuf* retval = NULL;
00385 
00386                         uint32 bid = 0;
00387                         int32 ret = 0;
00388 
00389                         if (_ibp) {
00390                                 ret = _ibp->tryGetBuffer(&bid);
00391                                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00392                                         retval = NULL;
00393                                 else
00394                                         retval = _ibp->use(bid);
00395                         } else
00396                                 retval = NULL;
00397 
00398                         return retval;
00399                 }
